source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    SourceContainer,
    SourceFolder,
    SourceFileName,
    ColumnDelimiter,
    FirstRowAsHeader,
    DestinationSchema,
    DestinationTable,
    DIUValue,
    ColumnMapping,
    ProcessingOrder
FROM [etl].[tControlMetadata3]
WHERE IsActive = 1
AND DestinationTable = 'ratings'
ORDER BY ProcessingOrder;
SELECT Id, SourceContainer, SourceFolder, SourceFile, ColumnDelimiter, EscapeChar, QuoteChar, SchemaName, TableName, DIU, ColumnMapping FROM [etl].[tControlMetadata]
